table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_lvc` ( `lvcid` int(11) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `description` text, `color` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `coloring_type` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `deleted` int(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`lvcid`), KEY `deleted` (`deleted`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB
